website_summaries.verdict: A good choice when it comes to volume and hold, but you might find better alternatives if your hair needs extra moisture to look its best.
pros: Offers a fluffy consistency that leaves all types of curls defined and full
Applying it to hair roots adds an extra boost
Contains plant-based ingredients that nourish hair
Most users rave about the scent
cons: Has the tendency to make hair feel a bit crunchy

customer_reviews.title: Not all the ingredients are on the website.  No returns with false advertising!
customer_reviews.text: I am sending this product back. I was talking to a friend who said she uses this product all the time. We looked on the website and it said nothing about butane or propane. I went into amazon to order. Again, nothing about butane or propane. Amazon did have a disclosure about how ingredients may differ from container. I actually read somewhere that they use no petroleum products. I received the product and the second ingredient is butane and the 4th ingredient is propane. No wonder it is so highly flammable.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Love the body and fullness
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. My hair dresser would use it and hair would do great but I could never replicate until I ordered this now my hubby and myself love the fullness and body it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Kholder

customer_reviews.title: Love! A must get for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Yes!! This mousse if fantastic and smells great. I have fine hair and prefer mousse over any other styling product. This makes my hair fluffy and full and lasts all day! My hair in the morning is still nice! I’m curious to see how my hair handles the mousses after a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: Stacy C

customer_reviews.title: Lots of volume
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have fine hair and This gives me a lot of body. Without it my hair is too silky. Adds some grit. Sort of like second day hair.
customer_reviews.author: cherstorm

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and service
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It gives a lot of light volume and smells great! Came very speedy and exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jones

customer_reviews.title: The odor is so strong that.......
customer_reviews.text: I can not tolerate.......had to wash my hair to get it off :( BUT one can not return it so there's $25.00 down the drain. They should make a clear note when ordering that it is "non-refundable .....not fair
customer_reviews.author: Pats favs

customer_reviews.title: Smells like old perfume!
customer_reviews.text: I could not even put this in my hair. I was most excited to try this after many good reviews and a suggestion from a stylist. HOWEVER, the smell was so intense, not in a good way. I washed my hands and they still smell, my sinuses are itchy. The container is extremely cold after shaking well and then saw the warning.
customer_reviews.author: RahRahH

customer_reviews.title: Concerning ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Really who would put butane and alcohol on their hair.
customer_reviews.author: Knskarlson

customer_reviews.title: Great hold for fine hair.
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this by my stylist. I was impressed by the way it added body to my very fine hair with no heaviness or sticky feeling. Works better than any mousse I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: AMIKA
customer_reviews.text: This is a great volume enhancer for your hair. I have fine thin hair and this really gives my hair body. You have to be careful and not use too much as it gives your hair a heavy feel. It is easy to use and goes a long way which is good because it is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best volume mousse
customer_reviews.text: Best volume mousse I have found so far! I combed it through from my roots to my ends and didn’t even have to blow dry it to notice the volume! I can’t wait to blow dry my hair with this product in. I love the scent too!
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Hood

customer_reviews.title: Works but too much perfume
customer_reviews.text: this product works very well but since I've removed perfume from my regular routine this was unusable and gave me an insane headache because there's so much perfume in it.
customer_reviews.author: Addy Stott

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It probably works better than any mousse I've tried before, as long as you don't use too much. It gives me the lift I want.
customer_reviews.author: jane fox

customer_reviews.title: I love Amika!
customer_reviews.text: God. Amika products have to be the best smelling hair care around. I just bought the whole thickening line - shampoo, conditioner, bombshell blowout, thicc volumizing base, and this plus size body mousse. I absolutely love them all, but you have to be carful to use only small amounts or your hair will end up feeling pretty gross. The only thing I wish is that they were more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: When I went to use this product the packaging was defective. I wanted to return it and it says not illegible. I am out the $25................................that sucks.
customer_reviews.author: April Martin

customer_reviews.title: Product malfunction-not working
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and really liked it. I just received my order and the I shook the can for about 10 minutes and it does NOT come out foam...it comes out runny and has a terrible smell to it. I don't know if this is an old can or not but I am very displeased as this product is NOT CHEAP!! It isn't worth me sending it back and pay the postage. I will use something different. Very dissatisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Body, finally!
customer_reviews.text: This added a lot of soft body and volume to my hair. It is nice mousse and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Koss6

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for fine, straight and unruly hair!! Love this product. It makes my hair manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mousse
customer_reviews.text: This product adds texture and volume to your hair. I love the way that it smells. I will buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Va-va-voolume!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It gives my lifeless curls unbelievable volume!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne U.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Only use once or twice a week. Holds style in hair well. Nice smell.
customer_reviews.author: Netta

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love Amika products and this product does what it says. The volume it gives is amazing, I use with my natural curl and it works when I need to straighten my hair.
customer_reviews.author: this app is amazing

customer_reviews.title: Volume without weight!
customer_reviews.text: Great mousse - adds volume without weight on my fine hair. Will repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It never disappoints and my hair looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Effective for wavy hair.
customer_reviews.text: Wish the price was better than at my salon. Not much savings, but it does save a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: great product love the scent
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair which I like curly but not crunchy. Works great and smells beautifull
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hornig

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff for my fine hair - a bit pricey, however I really like this brand of hair products. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Private Eye

customer_reviews.title: Please replace my item with one that is not damages
customer_reviews.text: I don’t want to write a review I would just like a new product sent to me because this one is missing parts/damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great product-HIGHLY recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Leaves my hair soft without any residue left behind. Worth every penny!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tina B.

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Real light weight. Best mousse I’ve ever used. Gives great body control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My hair loves this
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best hair product I’ve ever used. I have crazy frizzy curly hair and this keeps it in check.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M.

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with the clear plastic lid, however it seemed fine and unused
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Amika Plus size is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the volume this product gives my hair. I wear a short hair style and it gives it the fullness I want. My hair is fine and not super thick. It makes it very to just blow dry and get the style I want. I also love the scent!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on your hair.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Amika products. Suggested by my hairstylist and she was right. This product is gentle on your hair and still holds well.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Gallop

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: After about the 5th use, I could not get product to dispense. I have almost a full container left in the can. I would not recommend this product because of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the hold I get, and love the scent ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L Awalt

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine, thin hair
customer_reviews.text: This product is great if you have fine, thin hair. Adds volume & holds well
customer_reviews.author: Echo Lake Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best Mousse
customer_reviews.text: Does not make my hair crunchy and love how it makes my curls feel/look natural.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This styles my fine curly hair perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff just does a really great job on my hair. Keeps my curls in tact without being sticky or crunchy. Lots of volume at the root too. I just use my diffuser on it and it turns out great. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: alexis l sweet

customer_reviews.title: Urgent
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I need to return this product as it didn't work on my hair. Please advise how to proceed with this request. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What the He**?
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t order this and I can’t return it what the hell?
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Product
customer_reviews.text: Bad thing I only needed 1 and I now have 3 because some how I got on a monthly plan , really frustrating won’t use 1 in a year 🤔🤔🤔
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Clem

customer_reviews.title: Best mousse
customer_reviews.text: Gives great body to my fine hair and the smell is terrific!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bearup

customer_reviews.title: Greatest hair product around for thinning hair
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this item is that it makes you feel like your hair is just a little thicker plus there is less alcohol in it which doesn't dry out my scalp. I have tried other products but this is the best one I have found. Yes it is a little expensive but you deserve it and its worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: amika Plus Size Perfect Body Mousse, 8.5 oz
product_meta.description:
amika Plus Size Perfect Body mousse amp up hair for a fuller look and feel with this airy volumizing and bodifying mousse. Key Ingredients: Sea buckthorn berry is rich in vitamin C and A, antioxidants and healthy omega fatty acids, including the essential omega-7. VP/Acrylates/Lauryl Methacrylate Copolymer provides long-lasting movable, flexible hold and anti-humidity benefits. Free of MIT/MCI, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban, aluminum, talc, sulfates, parabens, phthalates, gluten, mineral oil, sodium chloride, petrochemicals and artificial colors. Has less than one percent synthetic fragrances. Vegetarian-friendly and cruelty-free. Safe for color-treated, Brazilian-treated and keratin-treated hair.

BRAND STORY
amika was founded by industry OUTSIDERS in Williamsburg, Brooklyn in 2007 and is the antithesis of a typical beauty brand. Instead of purveying unattainable perfection we believe in a totally individual version of beauty.
